title: A scholar says you cannot prolong your dua except in nafl salah - Assim al hakeem
transcript: this uh she says that there's a scholar who says that you cannot prolong your dua except in nfl prayer sunnah prayer or for prayer you must not prolong the dua this is bogus whoever differentiates must bring evidence from quran sunnah you don't have evidence from the quran sunnah remain silent because there is no difference you can make dua and prolong your dua in sujud of salat in whether it's whatever
